verses.text: Ix vak' pensar to ol in ya'ilej in b'eyb'al, yic max och in mul yuj tas svala'. Tzin yamoch vaan in ti' yacb'an ayek' eb' anima chuc spensar d'a vichanh.
Ix in em numnajoc, majxo valpaxlaj vach' lolonel. Palta axo in yaelal ix te nivtaji.
Vanxo stz'a in pixan ix vab'i. Yacb'an van in te naub'tanhani, ix vach' och pitz'an d'a in pixan. Yuj chi' chaanh ix in avaji, ix valani:
Mamin Jehová, ak' val vojtaquejeli to chamel b'a vaji, to jayenhej ab'il in q'uinal. In gana snachajel vuuj to elanhchamel tz'ek'b'at in q'uinal.
Quennhej in q'uinal ix ak'a'. Manh nivanoclaj in q'uinal d'a ichanh. A onh anima onh tic, icha val quik'an jab'oc quik', icha chi' co q'uinal.
Icha veven caj co masanil. Nab'anhej sco mak' k'unb'oc co b'a. ¿Tocval scak' co gana yed' co b'eyumal sco molb'ejq'ue b'ulan? Manh cojtacoc mach ol ik'ancanb'atoc.
Mamin Vajal, axo ticnaic, ¿tas vach' svak'och yipoc in k'ool? A ach ton ayach och yipoc in k'ool.
Colinel d'a masanil in chucal. Manh in a cha b'uchjoc yuj eb' chuc spensar.
Icha val eb' max ujilaj sloloni, icha chi' ix vutej in b'a. Manhxalaj tas ix elta d'a in ti', yujto a ach tic ix ak'och juntzanh tic d'ayin.
Iq'uel in yaelal ix ak'ochi. Vanxo in lajviel svab' yuj b'aj ix in a mak'a'.

A ach tzak'och co yaelal a onh anima onh tic. Tzak'anoch co tz'uumal yuj co mul. A ach tzak' lajvoc tas nib'ab'il cuuj, ichato tz'ijaxb'ati. Co masanil, icha val quik'an quik', icha chi' yek' co q'uinal.

Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal tic, cotanh q'uelan d'ayin ayic svalan in b'a d'ayach. Manh ak' sat a k'ool d'a yal in sat tic. Mamin, a d'ayach, eq'uelb'anhej vek' d'a sat luum tic icha eb' in mam vicham.
Mamin, manh ak'cot a k'ak'alk'olal d'ayin, yic vach' tzin tzalaj junoc rato, yacb'an manto el-laj in k'ool.
